original_text: So when they had come together, they asked him, “Lord, will you at this time restore the kingdom to Israel?”
korean_text: 그들이 모였을 때에 예수께 여쭈어 이르되 주께서 이스라엘 나라를 회복하심이 이 때니이까 하니

sentences.original_text: So when they had come together,
will you at this time restore the kingdom to Israel?”
